h3_title: Kang-Jin Loong Boss Fight and Guide
content: A majestic and terrifying Loong Dragon, Kang-Jin Loong will fly about the arena, making her a tricky foe to pin down. Even when she returns to a "resting" state, she'll usually be off the ground, and will regularly pull back her head out of reach. Expect her to deal a lot of shock damage, so stock up on shock-quelling medicine or you'll be taking double damage for a lot of this fight.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Kang-Jin_Loong.md', within the main section titled 'Kang-Jin Loong', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Kang-Jin Loong' and the sub-subsection 'Kang-Jin Loong Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
A majestic and terrifying Loong Dragon, Kang-Jin Loong will fly about the arena, making her a tricky foe to pin down. Even when she returns to a "resting" state, she'll usually be off the ground, and will regularly pull back her head out of reach. Expect her to deal a lot of shock damage, so stock up on shock-quelling medicine or you'll be taking double damage for a lot of this fight.
